properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:46PM CST until February 8 at 11:22PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge Affecting Montgomery
County.

.Heavy rainfall over the next 48 hours is expected to lead to
significant rises on Catoma Creek...and a flood warning is now in
effect for Catoma Creek at the U.S. 331 bridge.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.
* from late Thursday night to Saturday evening...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  9:00 PM Tuesday The stage Was 2.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by early Friday morning and
continue to rise to near 22.6 feet by Friday evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by late Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 24.0 feet...Residential and street flooding becomes a
problem...and increases rapidly above 24 feet. Several residences
are threatened.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
